@Shelleypatriota I live in upstate NY, and I have been all over the world and seen the effect of climate change with my own eyes. I have been on this planet more than 40 yrs, the change is noticeable to all the farmers in my area and everyone else.
To promote tanker transit of Northwest Passage in '69, p.r. firm made board game for oil co. http://t.co/K5Nhf7JOOt http://t.co/57952IWGkt

TIL that Chevron commissioned the makers of SimCity to create an oil refinery simulation, SimRefinery, in 1993. It was never released to the public.

If there are any former Chevron employees out there sitting on an old copy, I would absolutely love to see that shit.

@Nucks_Hockey @7sins_shadow @Nkechi62246023 @Internetchilla @ZieligN @ozm @PLOSONE NASA does both, but the sea ice isn’t a big factor for sea level b/c the vast majority of it already displaces water. What matters is land ice b/c when it melts it flows from above sea level into the oceans. By far, the 2 most most important locales are Antarctica & Greenland.
The reason Trump wants to buy Greenland is that it’s overwhelmingly white https://t.co/SUuGjWKmQe
